as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

invert.description: Whether to invert the stepper direction.

defaultValue.description: The value of the step that should be active when initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control the state of the steps.
defaultValue.description_zh: 初始渲染时应激活的步骤值.当您不需要控制步骤的状态时使用.

orientation.description: The orientation the steps are laid out. Mainly so arrow navigation is done accordingly (left & right vs. up & down).
orientation.description_zh: 步骤的布局方向.主要是为了相应地进行箭头导航（左右与上下).

dir.description: The reading direction of the combobox when applicable. If omitted, inherits globally from `ConfigProvider` or assumes LTR (left-to-right) reading mode.
dir.description_zh: 适用时组合框的阅读方向。如果省略，则从 `ConfigProvider` 全局继承或假定为 LTR()从左到右）阅读模式.

modelValue.description: The controlled value of the step to activate. Can be bound as `v-model`.
modelValue.description_zh: 要激活的步骤的受控值.可以绑定为 `v-model`.

linear.description: Whether or not the steps must be completed in order.
linear.description_zh: 步骤是否必须按顺序完成.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Fires when the value of the menu changes.
events.description_zh: 当菜单的值更改时触发。
